titles: A summarie ansvvere to al the material points in any of Master Darel his bookes More especiallie to that one booke of his, intituled, the Doctrine of the possession and dispossession of demoniaks out of the word of God. By Iohn Deacon. Iohn Walker. Preachers.
author: Deacon, John, 17th cent.
Walker, John, preacher. aut
notes: Particularly with reference to: Darrell, John.  A true narration of the strange and grevous vexation by the Devil, of 7. persons in Lancashire, and William Somers of Nottingham.
The authors' names are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
